thread.title: Defender Godfred Saka open to Aduana Stars stay
thread.title_full: Defender Godfred Saka open to Aduana Stars stay

title: Defender Godfred Saka open to Aduana Stars stay
text:
19:40 CET Defender Godfred Saka open to Aduana Stars stay Godfred Saka of Ghana during the 2014 CAF African Nations Championships match between Ghana and Libya on the 17 January 2014 at Free State Stadium Â© Sydney Mahlangu/BackpagePix 
Defender Godfred Saka says he will remain at Aduana Stars as he ponders over his next move. 
Saka, 29, has been with the Fire club ever since their promotion to the Premier League in the 2009/10 season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us The only way to be absolutely safe is never to try anything for the first time By: Ketor Edem
